entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:57 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 4:50 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: E 44 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then becoming south 60 gusting to 80 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
